solution_line_template: She needs {num_pies}*{apples_per_pie}=<<{num_pies}*{apples_per_pie}={total_apples_needed}>>{total_apples_needed} apples to make the pies
So she has to buy {total_apples_needed}-{apples_harvested}=<<{total_apples_needed}-{apples_harvested}={apples_to_buy}>>{apples_to_buy} more apples
